item.description:
This information is for those wishing to understand how to survive what will happen energetically in 2012. Since the planetary energetics are complex to explain, we will be meeting in a classroom with an overhead projector.

The reason we must prepare energetically ahead of time is to shield against the effects of increased planetary merkaba speeds, a topic which is not generally understood.

For those who don't even know what merkaba means, here is a definition:

http://www.keylonticd...

There is also a U-Tube presentation to view, which will help you to understand from a multi-dimensional galactic level what this is all about. This is even more complex, so please plan on devoting a total of 6 hours to view all 3 parts before this meetup.

Keep a note-book handy to jot down your questions, and bring them with you.

http://www.krystalspi...



The meetup adjourns at 9:00 PM. Please bring your own refreshments.

DIRECTIONS: Get on I-93 from wherever you are. We are approx. half an hour north of Concord, NH.

Get off on exit 22. At the end of the ramp go North on Rt. 127 (toward Gaza). In approx. 1.5 miles you will come to a stop sign.

Turn left, going North on Rt 132. Watch for mailbox number 298 on the right side of the road, approx. 1.5 mi. up. A tan building with semi-circular window is across the street, on the left side.

Go up the first driveway into the property, which has a Meetup sign at the end. Do NOT go up the second driveway which has a sign "ULCS Clinic". No parking is allowed there, so if you get that far, turn around in that driveway and go back and up the first driveway.

Enter through the front door, where you will see another Meetup sign. No need to knock. Just go on in and down the stairs and have a seat in the classroom. If you are arriving early for a private appointment, have a seat in the waiting room instead.
item.how_to_find_us: Go up first driveway, which has Meetup sign at end. Go in front door, which has another Meetup sign. No need to knock. Just have a seat in the downstairs classroom.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Understanding what will happen in 2012
